title: Take It In: Novel Use of an Iron Bio-Absorbable Stent in Pediatric Pulmonary Stenosis
content: Bio-absorbable stents are a novel tool which relieve stenosis and then resorb as the patient grows, avoiding obligatory re-intervention. This case describes the novel use of an iron bio-absorbable stent in a child with surgically repaired Tetralogy of Fallot who post-operatively developed a severely stenotic right ventricular outflow tract.
